sn51.22:1.2: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn51.22:1.3: “abhijanati nu kho, bhante, bhagava iddhiya manomayena kayena brahmalokam upasankamita”ti?
sn51.22:1.4: “Abhijanami khvaham, ananda, iddhiya manomayena kayena brahmalokam upasankamita”ti.
sn51.22:1.5: “Abhijanati pana, bhante, bhagava imina catumahabhutikena kayena iddhiya brahmalokam upasankamita”ti?
sn51.22:1.6: “Abhijanami khvaham, ananda, imina catumahabhutikena kayena iddhiya brahmalokam upasankamita”ti.
sn51.22:2.1: “Yanca kho omati, bhante, bhagava iddhiya manomayena kayena brahmalokam upasankamitum, yanca kho abhijanati, bhante, bhagava imina catumahabhutikena kayena iddhiya brahmalokam upasankamita, tayidam, bhante, bhagavato acchariyanceva abbhutanca”ti.
sn51.22:2.2: “Acchariya ceva, ananda, tathagata acchariyadhammasamannagata ca, abbhuta ceva, ananda, tathagata abbhutadhammasamannagata ca.
sn51.22:3.1: Yasmim, ananda, samaye tathagato kayampi citte samodahati cittampi kaye samodahati, sukhasannanca lahusannanca kaye okkamitva viharati;
sn51.22:3.2: tasmim, ananda, samaye tathagatassa kayo lahutaro ceva hoti mudutaro ca kammaniyataro ca pabhassarataro ca.
sn51.22:4.1: Seyyathapi, ananda, ayogulo divasam santatto lahutaro ceva hoti mudutaro ca kammaniyataro ca pabhassarataro ca;
sn51.22:4.2: evameva kho, ananda, yasmim samaye tathagato kayampi citte samodahati, cittampi kaye samodahati, sukhasannanca lahusannanca kaye okkamitva viharati;
sn51.22:4.3: tasmim, ananda, samaye tathagatassa kayo lahutaro ceva hoti mudutaro ca kammaniyataro ca pabhassarataro ca.
sn51.22:5.1: Yasmim, ananda, samaye tathagato kayampi citte samodahati, cittampi kaye samodahati, sukhasannanca lahusannanca kaye okkamitva viharati;
sn51.22:5.2: tasmim, ananda, samaye tathagatassa kayo appakasireneva pathaviya vehasam abbhuggacchati,
sn51.22:5.3: so anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti—ekopi hutva bahudha hoti, bahudhapi hutva eko hoti …pe… yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteti.
sn51.22:6.1: Seyyathapi, ananda, tulapicu va kappasapicu va lahuko vatupadano appakasireneva pathaviya vehasam abbhuggacchati;
sn51.22:6.2: evameva kho, ananda, yasmim samaye tathagato kayampi citte samodahati, cittampi kaye samodahati, sukhasannanca lahusannanca kaye okkamitva viharati;
sn51.22:6.3: tasmim, ananda, samaye tathagatassa kayo appakasireneva pathaviya vehasam abbhuggacchati,
sn51.22:6.4: so anekavihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti—ekopi hutva bahudha hoti …pe… yava brahmalokapi kayena vasam vatteti”ti.
